TopicTitle: KSP black screen after launching it

Articles.Content:
So I downloaded KSP and tried to launch the game. the game loaded with just a black screen. I tried to search the internet and found a forum made by deforestation kelley about this issue. Problem is, i have no nvidia or amd graphics, only intel hd graphics. there's nothing in the log.

any helps would be appreciated.
Does sound like a driver issue. are they up to date?
